author: jsign
content:
If people want to check if you have `go` installed:
```
$ go run github.com/jsign/go-kzg-ceremony-client/cmd/kzgcli@latest verify-transcript                                                                                       
Pulling current transcript from sequencer... OK
Verifying transcript... Valid! (took 83.20s)
```
